data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the county of Magura, Khulna, Bangladesh who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Magura, Khulna, Bangladesh
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the county of Magura to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 798 lost neighbors

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Magura, Khulna, Bangladesh that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.
Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 914,494 who are far from you in Magura, Khulna, Bangladesh from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Rayeen (Hindu traditions) people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Magura, Khulna, Bangladesh into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Magura, Khulna, Bangladesh. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the county of Magura.

location.name: Magura
location.people_groups_list: Chitrakar (Muslim traditions), Behara, Baha'i, Jogi (Hindu traditions), Pod
